reviews.review_msg: Dr. Hira is very demanding, but also very helpful.  (I've never had an assignment returned to me that had so many comments and suggestions for improvement.)  If you want an easy class, he's not for you, but if you want to actually learn something and be challenged, then there's no one better.
he's way too hard~~ a smart prof tho...but way way way too hard. hard to please him no matter how hard u try!
I found her to be an excellent instructor; highly knowledgeable and engaging.
I really enjoyed her class. I learned a lot about Latin America..

Dollar for dollar, the worst investment I've made at SFU. The lady is well-intentioned, but she does nothing but read her prepared statements verbatim, is terribly undynamic.t was never clear how to get a good grade on the paper since there were no helpful comments. Pull the syllabus and do the reading yourself.

No text for the class.  She's a young prof so she's not that great in teaching but the material was interesting.  She marks pretty fair but I had to work really hard for my grade because she expects you to know about Latin America and we were all beginners. No text for the course
